se.sics.jasper

Interface PrologException

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomRegisterFailure, ConversionFailedException, IllegalCallerException, IllegalTermException, SPException

    public interface PrologException
    Represents an exception thrown by a Prolog object. User code should catch a PrologException.
